shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the user role switches in the interactive live streaming.

section.p: This callback notifies the application of a user role switch when the application calls the \ref IRtcEngine::setClientRole "setClientRole" method.
The SDK triggers this callback when the local user switches the user role by calling after joining the channel.

plentry.pd: Role that the user switches from: .
Role that the user switches to: .
